diff_hunk:
@@ -30,13 +30,26 @@ cmake --version
 pip install -r requirements.txt || true
 
 if [[ "$BUILD_ENVIRONMENT" == *rocm* ]]; then
+  # This is necessary in order to cross compile (or else we'll have missing GPU device).
   export HCC_AMDGPU_TARGET=gfx900
+
+  # These environment variables are not set on CI when we were running as the Jenkins user.
+  # The HIP Utility scripts require these environment variables to be set in order to run without error.
   export LANG=C.UTF-8
   export LC_ALL=C.UTF-8
+  export PYTORCH_BUILT_WITH_ROCM=1
body: This is misnamed, and put in the wrong place. The only place you're reading this environment variable is in the test script. So you should name this `PYTORCH_TEST_WITH_ROCM` and put it in the test script, with the rest of the envvars.
body_html: This is misnamed, and put in the wrong place. The only place you're reading this environment variable is in the test script. So you should name this PYTORCH_TEST_WITH_ROCM and put it in the test script, with the rest of the envvars.
body_text: This is misnamed, and put in the wrong place. The only place you're reading this environment variable is in the test script. So you should name this PYTORCH_TEST_WITH_ROCM and put it in the test script, with the rest of the envvars.
